participants.name: Mark Camacho
participants.url: Senior Managing Partner at Del Sol Real Estate Investments

messages.message:
Brian
http://digg.com/video/this-machine-is-like-a-paper-shredder-but-for-whole-trees
This Machine Is Like A Paper Shredder, But For Whole Trees
The device in question is called an excavator mulcher and we'd like to be as far away from it as possible at all times.
digg.com
Wow! That machine doesn't mess around!

Brian
What are the yellow flowering trees that you just got trimmed called?  They have a lot of long skinny leaves along your back wall.
I'll get back to you on that one later. I think they're from the oleander family Not sure on the name exactly. Will be back home tomorrow from Cali. Hope things are looking good at home
Was you able to put some yard stuff in our trash? Hopefully the other neighbors have room too.

Brian
Oh yeah, it should be cleared this week.

Brian
Happy birthday! Enjoy the potpourri
It's great, too funny. Thank you!!

Brian
Haha I knew you would like that  so useful!!

Hi Brian, I didn't intend to come across rude to your guest. When the girls see a strange man in our yard they get scared and of course, I confront the person. I didn't know he was staying with you at first.

Brian
Hey, we didn't hear anything.  Sorry, just seeing this.  They are strange.  I am not sure why they would be your yard.  I'll let Iga know.  This family of Arabs is a friend of Iga's from college so we know them personally.

Brian
They don't speak much English.
